directive_ref: CEO DIRECTIVE WAVE 15/15A - AUTONOMOUS GOLDEN NEEDLE HUNT WITH SOURCE ATTRIBUTION

Let's uncover how the Bitcoin four year cycle now tracks politics and liquidity. Are elections replacing halving events as price drivers?

hypothesis_content.title: Stablecoin Supply Inflection as a Leading Regime Change Indicator
hypothesis_content.statement: A reversal in the 30-day trend of aggregate stablecoin supply (USDT+USDC+DAI) from contraction to expansion, while price is in a BEAR or NEUTRAL regime, will lead a transition to a BULL regime within 15 trading days with 70% probability.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Stablecoin supply is a direct measure of on-chain liquidity available for crypto purchases. Sustained contraction indicates capital leaving the ecosystem. A reversal from this trend is a fundamental prerequisite for a sustained bullish move, as new dry powder enters the system. It often leads price and regime changes.
entry_conditions: 30-day simple moving average of aggregate stablecoin supply has been declining for at least 20 days
The daily aggregate supply value crosses *and closes above* its 10-day SMA, confirming a potential trend reversal
BTC price is above its weekly open (positive momentum on the weekly frame)

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Stablecoin supply fails to sustain growth and falls back below its 10-day SMA for 3 consecutive days
exit_conditions.time_exit: Exit after 15 trading days if regime has not shifted to BULL

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Multiple instances where stablecoin supply expands convincingly but the market regime fails to transition to BULL (or even deteriorates to STRESS) within the timeframe would falsify its efficacy as a leading indicator in the current cycle.
